about.me: ADACO is a charity focused pool helping to feed children orphanage centers with healthy food🥗🍉🍲🍪 and fruits🍉🍓. Join us on Telegram and Twitter to see past donations and happy faces because of Cardano.
about.server: Secure and reliable cloud and bare metal server running on AWS, ( 1 BP, 32 GB RAM, 8 Core, High Read-Write SSD ) and ( 2 Relays, 8 GB RAM, 4 Core, High Read-Write SSD )
